eadid.publicid: -//David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library//TEXT (US::NcD::Francis Ulric Farquhar papers, 1857-1883 //EN

titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Francis Ulric Farquhar papers, 1857-1883
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Rubenstein Staff; EAD finding aid derived from MARC record using marc2ead_sectionA.xsl

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid derived from MARC record via marc2ead_sectionA.xsl, May 2019

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.abstract: Includes an unbound scrapbook (24 p.) containing a memoir of Farquhar by General O.M. Poe (1883) with covering letter to Farquhar's widow, resolution of the Board of Trade of Minneapolis similarly addressed, certificate of Farquhar's appointment as a cadet (1857), General Order of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers on Farquhar's career and mourning his death, copies of two letters of W.T. Sherman to Farquhar's widow and the Commissioner of Pensions (1883), a letter from Farquhar (1864), and two undated poems.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Francis Ulric Farquhar Papers, 1857-1883, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, May 2019.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Francis Ulric Farquhar was a member of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Includes an unbound scrapbook (24 p.) containing a memoir of Farquhar by General O.M. Poe (1883) with covering letter to Farquhar's widow, resolution of the Board of Trade of Minneapolis similarly addressed, certificate of Farquhar's appointment as a cadet (1857), General Order of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers on Farquhar's career and mourning his death, copies of two letters of W.T. Sherman to Farquhar's widow and the Commissioner of Pensions (1883), a letter from Farquhar (1864), and two undated poems.

odd.p: Unprocessed collection. Cataloged from accession record.

controlaccess.subject: Engineers -- United States
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers
